name: Naturoville Vedic Retreat:
tag_list: spa-in-dehradun, resort-in-dehradun, naturoville-luxury-spa-resort, naturoville-spa-dehradun, rishikesh-yoga-resort, moksha-himalaya-spa-resort, yoga-packages
overview: Uttarakhand state INDIA. The Ayurveda centre Naturoville engaged in the practice and propagation of Ayurveda: The ancient health science of INDIA, offering a deep healing, a doorway to the union of the body, mind and soul. “AMRITA” The Ayurveda centre Naturoville offers classical and authentic Kerala Ayurveda treatments and therapies to patients across the Globe. Naturoville is a Vedic Retreat tucked away in the foothills of Himalayas near the holy cities of Rishikesh and Haridwar. The Retreat takes inspiration from the wisdom of the ancient Indian Rishi’s (wise ascetics) of the Vedic period (1700-1100 BC). Naturoville aims to provide its patrons with the experience of relevant vedic wisdom in the modern context through its various Ayurveda treatments and therapies. The Ayurveda Centre provides safe and comfortable Ayurveda and Yoga based health care amd wellness packages for its guest/s and offers hospitality based on an abundance of knowledge and experience.

offices.address1: P.o Resham Majri, Lal Tapper Haridwar Road
